Name: girl friend simulator
About the game: ******Game control and buttons****** Within 2.5 meters with her, after the cursor is focus on her: --------Use the right mouse button to chat with her. --------Use the left mouse button to touch her, Or you can also pick up the item with the button (Only some things can be picked up). --------Use the 'Tab' key to view her current properties (Status bar). --------'Q' key to put down item. --------'Space' Key to jump. --------'Ctrl' Key to crouch. *********************************** ******How to increase the favorability(red bar)****** With her dialogue, tasks, games... you can increase the value of the red bar. ****************************************** ******How to enter a small game****** 1- The value of the red bar reaches 10. 2- By talking to her, select the 'Let's play the game, okay?' dialog box to start the game. 3- Follow the tips she gave you. *********************************** ******More content****** fill the red status bar as much as possible. Use a method similar to playing a small game to access. *********************************** ******Other****** 1- The game will be automatically archived without concern 2- If you encounter some unrecoverable bugs, please restart the game. If the restart still cannot be resolved, please contact us. 3- The game button can be viewed in menu by pressing the 'Esc' key in the game. 4- If performance is low, you can improve performance by setting to window mode ('F11' Key or set in the menu) or by reducing the shadow quality level. ***************** Thanks for your support!
